name: Swap-Swap Panda
description:
Swap-Swap Panda is a cute platform game where two pandas go on an adventure to take back the cupcakes stolen by some pesky ninjas. You will cross a wonderfull land full of bamboo forests, fantastic sights, and hazards.

You'll be in control of two pandas, a chubby giant panda and a funny red panda, each of which with different abilities needed to overcome all the obstacles in the levels. That's right, just with teamwork you'll be able to get through all the levels, by switching pandas and controlling one at a time.

Giant panda will be able to swim in lakes carrying red panda on its back, on the other hand red panda is able to climb bamboo and activate switches to open the path for giant panda.

Swap-Swap Panda is a cute adventure that will keep you engaged with many levels and replay values too as you need to collect all the stolen cupcakes in order to fully complete the game.

Features:
• Control two pandas
• Fun puzzle mechanics
• Cute pixel art
• Play in 20 locations
• Traditional platformer controls
